name: One Click At A Time
description:
This is the epic tale of a button, that you can click… Yes, that is what it says… 

But wait! This on the first glance seamingly simple game is more than your regular clicker games. It has a slowly evolving Story with which we won’t want to spoil you yet. All we can say is that it is not what you might be expecting at first.

Game Jam

This game was created as an entry to the  Boundless Game Jam

Because we started a little late we worked 5 Days on this Project.
